data.title: Who is Tom Hanks’s Wife? All About Rita Wilson
data.meta_description: Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson got married in 1988 and have two children together. They initially met while working
data.text:
Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson met in 1981 while working on the ABC sitcom Bosom Buddies.

They first worked together on their first movie, Volunteers, in 1985.

Tom and Rita first appeared together at the premiere of Three Amigos in 1986.

Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson got married in 1988 and have two children together. They initially met while working on the ABC sitcom Bosom Buddies in 1981. Even though they were just friends initially since Hanks was married to his college sweetheart Samantha Lewes, they later revealed their relationship in 1986.

Hanks and Wilson met for the first time while working on the TV show Bosom Buddies in 1981. Hanks was already the star of the show for two seasons, and even though Wilson was in just one episode and Hanks was married, they became instant friends.

Hanks and Wilson worked together on their first movie in 1985 called Volunteers. They portrayed lovers in the film, and Hanks mentioned that they immediately felt a strong connection.

Hanks and Wilson first appeared together as a couple at the premiere of Three Amigos in 1986. Even though Hanks and Lewes finalized their divorce in 1987, they had already separated before Hanks and Wilson got together.

Hanks married Wilson in April 1988, and she famously wore a unique and short wedding dress.

Hanks and Wilson got married, and after two years, on August 4, 1990, they had their first child named Chester “Chet” Hanks. Following in his parents’ footsteps, Chet has chosen a career in entertainment.

Hanks and Wilson teamed up in another movie called Sleepless in Seattle in 1993, where they played brother and sister instead of romantic partners, unlike their roles in Volunteers in 1985.

Hanks and Wilson had their second son on December 26, 1995, named Truman Theodore Hanks. Unlike his brother and parents who are into acting, Truman works behind the camera in the entertainment industry.

Hanks and Wilson, who acted together on screen, teamed up off-screen to make the romantic comedy film My Big Fat Greek Wedding in 2002. They continued as producers for the sequel, My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2, and were executive producers for the TV sitcom My Big Fat Greek Life, where Wilson had a brief appearance.

The actress showcased her acting skills not only in movies but also on stage when she played Roxie Hart in Chicago in 2006. Hanks showed his support for Wilson during her Broadway debut.

In 2019, Hanks stood by Wilson during her Hollywood Walk of Fame star ceremony. He not only cheered for her from the front row but also went up on stage to speak at the podium, praising her successful career and achievements.

Hanks and Wilson went through COVID-19 together in March 2020 when the pandemic began. Wilson shared in an interview that dealing with the virus alongside the Forrest Gump star made the health challenge a bit easier for them.

Hanks attended a special showing of the movie Elvis, and Wilson was there to support him. The event took place in New York City and was hosted by Vogue’s Anna Wintour and director Baz Luhrmann. The screening had a star-studded guest list, including Tim McGraw, Zac Posen, Vera Wang, and more.

Hanks, who plays Colonel Tom Parker in the film, joined the main cast on stage, including Austin Butler, Olivia DeJonge, Kelvin Harrison Jr., and Yola. Before the movie started, Hanks, Butler, Luhrmann, and Wintour shared some opening remarks.

Wilson has been with Hanks during his press tour for Elvis, and in turn, Hanks has been there to support his wife and her musical project.

Hanks and Wilson attended the big debut of the live-action Pinocchio, where Hanks stars as Geppetto. They both walked the red carpet and chatted with reporters about the unique experience of bringing the classic 1940 animated film to life in a new way.

The pair went to the 13th yearly Governors Awards in Los Angeles. Hanks wore a smart black suit with a tie, and Wilson looked stunning in a shiny gown with a low neckline.

Hanks and Wilson went to the Cannes Film Festival to watch the premiere of Wes Anderson’s movie, Asteroid City, in which they both act. They were photographed happily walking the red carpet, with Wilson in a black dress and her husband looking sharp in a traditional black-and-white tuxedo.

The pair went to the 14th annual Governors Awards in Los Angeles. Wilson, who is part of the Academy’s Board of Governors, looked stunning in a red-sequin dress designed by Jenny Packham, while Hanks looked handsome in a black suit.
